name: The legend of Greg
description:
Legend of Greg is a 2D roguelike dungeon crawler that was made in 2 weeks as part of a bachelor's thesis I am currently doing. The game has two versions, A and B, with both versions being slightly different. I would appreciate it a lot if you try both versions out and after answer a few questions in the form linked below. Otherwise, feel free to enjoy the game and give feedback.

https://forms.gle/1jFScz9KdkaPrhro8

Thank you for playing! 

I am aware that no sound is played when picking up hearts and gems, this is because an unknown pitch was played at the ending of the pickup sound when played in the itch.io browser.
